TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MDLMaterialSemantic extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates the semantics of an .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic AmbientOcclusion = unsigned int64(22)

Docs.summary: The property represents the reduction in ambient light due to neighboring geometry on a surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic AmbientOcclusionScale = unsigned int64(23)

Docs.summary: The property represents the scaling factor for ambient occlusion.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Anisotropic = unsigned int64(7)

Docs.summary: The property represents the degree of elongation in the tangential direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic AnisotropicRotation = unsigned int64(8)

Docs.summary: The property represents the angle of anisotropy relative to the tangent direction. [0.0, 1.0] maps to [0.0, 2*PI] radians.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic BaseColor = unsigned int64(0)

Docs.summary: The property represents the base color of a surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Bump = unsigned int64(14)

Docs.summary: The property represents the magnitude of the bump perturbation of a surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Clearcoat = unsigned int64(11)

Docs.summary: The property represents the intensity of added specular highlights.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic ClearcoatGloss = unsigned int64(12)

Docs.summary: The property represents the spread of added specular highlights.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Displacement = unsigned int64(20)

Docs.summary: The property represents the displacement of a surface material in the normal direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic DisplacementScale = unsigned int64(21)

Docs.summary: The property represents the magnitude of the displacement of a surface material in the normal direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Emission = unsigned int64(13)

Docs.summary: The property represents the color of surface radiance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic InterfaceIndexOfRefraction = unsigned int64(16)

Docs.summary: The property represents the n1 term in Schlick's approximation of the Fresnel factor in specular relection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic MaterialIndexOfRefraction = unsigned int64(17)

Docs.summary: The property represents the n2 term in Schlick's approximation of the Fresnel factor in specular relection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Metallic = unsigned int64(2)

Docs.summary: The property represents the degree that a surface appears metallic.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic None = unsigned int64(32768)

Docs.summary: The property's semantics have not been set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic ObjectSpaceNormal = unsigned int64(18)

Docs.summary: The property represents the variation in normal vectors for a material, in the tangent coordinate system.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Opacity = unsigned int64(15)

Docs.summary: The property represents the opacity of the material.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Roughness = unsigned int64(6)

Docs.summary: The property represents the roughness of the material.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Sheen = unsigned int64(9)

Docs.summary: The property represents the intensity of glancing highligths.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic SheenTint = unsigned int64(10)

Docs.summary: The property represents the tint of glancing highligths.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Specular = unsigned int64(3)

Docs.summary: The property represents the intensity of specular highligths.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic SpecularExponent = unsigned int64(4)

Docs.summary: The property represents the Blinn-Phong exponent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic SpecularTint = unsigned int64(5)

Docs.summary: The property represents the balance between light color and surface color for specular highligts.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ModelIO.MDLMaterialSemantic Subsurface = unsigned int64(1)

Docs.summary: The property represents the degree of subsurface light penetration.
